content.text: Each business knows the value of great visibility, and what better way to get noticed by potential customers than with a good pylon sign right outside your doorstep? According to a study run by the University of Cincinnati, pylon signs were deemed to have high visibility and increased sales by 15%.

At Royal Signs & Awnings, we know the importance of investing in visibility, and this is why we specialize in delivering high-quality pylon signs tailored to suit your business identity and your budget. We know pylon signs aren’t just for attraction purposes. They must also serve as directional signs so that potential customers will know where to go in order to check your business out. They are often used as tenant signs , indicating all of the businesses located within a shopping center or business park.
Royal Signs & Awnings delivers highly effective pole signs that fulfill their purposes: they instantly and clearly introduce your brand to passersby and motorists, then leading them to your store.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation!

Royal Signs & Awnings is out to take your brand visibility to a whole new level. We can help you get 24/7 exposure with illuminated road sign boxes . We can customize steel cabinets to your preferred shape and size. You can also choose either interchangeable sign faces or the more permanent channel letters .
Because illuminated pylon signs are highly customizable, Royal Signs & Awnings can create one that meets your exact needs.
For extra visibility during the night time, you can even get multi-layered signs with LED or neon lighting. We have the artistic talent and meticulous craftsmanship to deliver your dream sign.

If you don’t need your pylon sign to light up in the evenings, you can actually save some money by getting yourself a non-illuminated pylon sign. They give your business the exposure that you’re looking for when you need it and they don’t have to cost a lot.
Royal Signs & Awnings creates non-illuminated road signs that have steel frames with aluminum sides, and a custom-designed face mounted on one or multiple steel poles.

Royal Signs & Awnings delivers full color, digital prints with designs tailored to your brand. With high-quality pylon signs made by Royal Signs & Awnings, you can expect your signs to eventually become a familiar landmark in your area.

A pylon sign’s durability is one thing that shouldn’t be compromised. They are left out in the elements the entire time so they need to be able to stand against wind and harsh weather. Royal Signs & Awnings understands all this, which is why our goal is to deliver a pylon sign that’s effective and stays effective for years!
Your options for sign cabinets include aluminum tubing, steel, aluminum extrusions, and other sturdy materials. For your sign faces, you can have acrylic, vinyl, polycarbonate, channel letters, etc.

We can even create water-resistant digital pole and pylon signs, allowing you to update your message as frequently and quickly as you would like, confident that it will display correctly in order to attract attention in all conditions.

Royal Signs & Awnings has been building signs for many years, and our experience is one thing that we are very proud of. We know the ins and outs of the pylon sign business so we know exactly how we can speed things up for you.

With our team of artists, engineers, and signage experts, Royal Signs & Awnings can guide you and assist during the entire sing-making process. From conceptualization, to design, to production, and all the way to installation. We also assist you with compliance and legal signage requirements.
Should you need help with maintenance , rebranding, changing sign faces, we’re just one call away.

Regardless of which industry you’re in, Royal Signs & Awnings is the perfect pylon sign provider for you. We’ve catered to the business needs of gas stations, hotels, restaurants, retail stores, malls, and many others. We are excited to work with you.
Want to know more about how pylon signs can help give your business a boost? Have a chat with one of our sign specialists.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation with a Pylon Signs Expert!
Team was amazing to work with!
